The collaborative experience of pursuing and attaining a common goal in athletics is unique, as it is combined with interscholastic competition. We are  proud of our winning tradition.

Through this experience, our students are able to develop courage as they take risks, strength while displaying finesse, competitive intensity while exhibiting generosity of spirit, and mental as well as physical endurance.[/stm_blockquote][stm_spacing xs_spacing=”80px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1455098787501{padding-top: 38px !important;padding-bottom: !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Facilities” tab_id=”1455098479333-8a47dd82-6e4b”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_title title_tag=”h4″ sep_color=”green” sep_enable=”true” title=”Lorem ipsum”][/stm_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1455113976063{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Secondary School`s proud tradition of athletics is reflected in the beauty and function of its campus facilities, the Haraldur Athletic Complex and Hopkins Gymnasium.

Ford Athletic Field, complete with digital scoreboards, allows Athletics lacrosse, soccer, and softball teams to host games on regulation fields; CIF-SS regulation-sized Hopkins Gymnasium is home court for basketball and volleyball. Secondary school athletes also benefit from use of the Rosenbaum Family Weight Training Room, a facility designed specifically for our students.[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing xs_spacing=”40px” sm_spacing=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_single_image img_responsive_enable=”true” img_id=”1159″ img_size=”540×392″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1455183754787{padding-top: 38px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_id=”resources”][vc_column][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” sep_enable=”true” title=”Athletic Resources”][/stm_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_title title_tag=”h4″ title=”School Athletic Trainer” title_margin_b=”24px”][/stm_title][stm_teacher_bio img_id=”1165″ title=”John Appleseed,” position=”ATC, CPT”]John is a Certified Athletic Trainer, Certified Personal Trainer, and Health and Safety Specialist offering a strong background in injury care, prevention, rehabilitation, health promotion and wellness. John has an enduring passion for continuous education and has intentionally engaged in various work experiences for a well-rounded scope on healthcare. John’s primary interests include nutrition and biomechanics, with a concentrated focus on improving performance.

For injury prevention, diagnosis, or treatment information, please email John at jappleseed@stylemixthemes.com.[/stm_teacher_bio][stm_spacing xs_spacing=”45px” sm_spacing=”45px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_single_image img_responsive_enable=”true” img_id=”1162″ img_size=”181×265″ css=”.vc_custom_1460722644398{margin-bottom: 16px !important;}”][stm_btn_simple btn_size=”size-custom” btn_icon_position=”right” btn_icon_size=”5px” btn_icon_hspace=”6px” btn_icon_enable=”true” btn_link=”url:%23||” btn_link_text=”Download Guidebook” btn_custom_text_size=”13px” btn_custom_height=”36px” btn_custom_padd_l=”19px” btn_custom_padd_r=”16px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
